OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

PremiumEmote.label: Premium Emote
PremiumEmote.tooltip: The premium emote for the Epic Win

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

OnCooldown.value: $username the command is still on cooldown for $cooldown seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $username 
 $cooldown

OnUserCooldown.value: $username the command is still on user cooldown for $cooldown seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $username 
 $cooldown

AcceptAllin.label: Accept all in
AcceptAllin.tooltip: Enable/Disable that the user can bet all points

MultiplierTwoApart.label: Multiplier 2 emotes apart
MultiplierTwoApart.tooltip: Multiplier when 2 emotes are hit but are apart

MultiplierTwoSidebySide.label: Multiplier 2 emotes side by side
MultiplierTwoSidebySide.tooltip: Multiplier when 2 emotes are hit and side by side

MultiplierEpicWin.label: Multiplier 3 premium emotes
MultiplierEpicWin.tooltip: Multiplier when 3 premium emotes are hit

Timeout.label: Timeout users who fail
Timeout.tooltip: If enabled viewers that fail will get timed out. Only available for Twitch

TL.label: Timeout length
TL.tooltip: Length for the timeout if users fail

InfoResponse.value: $username you have to set a value between $min and $max $currency that you want to bet. Or you dare to just go all in ;)
InfoResponse.label: Info response
InfoResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user doesn't set an amount to bet. 
 $username 
 $min 
 $max 
 $currency

AllinResponse.value: $username you went all in with a value of $points $currency. Good Luck!
AllinResponse.label: All in response
AllinResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user goes all in. 
 $username 
 $points 
 $currency

TwoApartResponse.value: $username you pulled the lever [ $slots ] and got 2 same emotes! You won $points $currency!
TwoApartResponse.label: Two Apart Response
TwoApartResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user hits 2 same emotes that are apart 
 $username 
 $slots 
 $points 
 $currency

TwoSidebySideResponse.value: $username you pulled the lever [ $slots ] and got 2 same emotes next to each other! You won $points $currency!
TwoSidebySideResponse.label: Two Side by Side response
TwoSidebySideResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user hits 2 same emotes that are next to each other 
 $username 
 $slots 
 $points 
 $currency

JackpotResponse.value: $username you pulled the lever [ $slots ] and got the Jackpot! You won $points $currency!
JackpotResponse.label: Jackpot response
JackpotResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user hits 3 same emotes 
 $username 
 $slots 
 $points 
 $currency

EpicWinResponse.value: $username you pulled the lever [ $slots ] and got the Epic Win! You won $points $currency!
EpicWinResponse.label: Epic Win response
EpicWinResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user hits 3 same premium emotes 
 $username 
 $slots 
 $points 
 $currency

LoseResponse.value: $username you pulled the lever [ $slots ] and got nothing. You lost $points $currency!
LoseResponse.label: Lose response
LoseResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user doesn't hit min. 2 same emotes 
 $username 
 $slots 
 $points 
 $currency

NotEnoughResponse.value: $username you don't have enough $currency to attempt this! You will need atleast $points $currency.
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user doesn't have enough points 
 $username 
 $currency 
 $points

PermissionResponse.value: $username -> only $permission ($permissioninfo) and higher can use this command
PermissionResponse.label: Permission denied response
PermissionResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the user doesn't select any valid wire. 
 $username 
 $permission 
 $permissioninfo

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
